69 // Structure JointInfo
73 struct JointInfo {
74 
75  public :
76 
77  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
78 
80  RigidBody* body1;
81 
83  RigidBody* body2;
84 
86  JointType type;
87 
90  JointsPositionCorrectionTechnique positionCorrectionTechnique;
91 
93  bool isCollisionEnabled;
94 
96  JointInfo(JointType constraintType)
97  : body1(nullptr), body2(nullptr), type(constraintType),
98  positionCorrectionTechnique(JointsPositionCorrectionTechnique::NON_LINEAR_GAUSS_SEIDEL),
99  isCollisionEnabled(true) {}
100 
102  JointInfo(RigidBody* rigidBody1, RigidBody* rigidBody2, JointType constraintType)
103  : body1(rigidBody1), body2(rigidBody2), type(constraintType),
104  positionCorrectionTechnique(JointsPositionCorrectionTechnique::NON_LINEAR_GAUSS_SEIDEL),
105  isCollisionEnabled(true) {
106  }
107 
109  virtual ~JointInfo() = default;
110 
111 };
112 
113 // Class Joint
117 class Joint {
118 
119  protected :
120 
121  // -------------------- Attributes -------------------- //
122 
124  uint mId;
125 
127  RigidBody* const mBody1;
128 
130  RigidBody* const mBody2;
131 
133  const JointType mType;
134 
136  uint mIndexBody1;
137 
139  uint mIndexBody2;
140 
142  JointsPositionCorrectionTechnique mPositionCorrectionTechnique;
143 
145  bool mIsCollisionEnabled;
146 
148  bool mIsAlreadyInIsland;
149 
151  static uint mNbTotalNbJoints;
152 
153  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
154 
156  bool isAlreadyInIsland() const;
157 
159  virtual size_t getSizeInBytes() const = 0;
160 
162  virtual void initBeforeSolve(const ConstraintSolverData& constraintSolverData) = 0;
163 
165  virtual void warmstart(const ConstraintSolverData& constraintSolverData) = 0;
166 
168  virtual void solveVelocityConstraint(const ConstraintSolverData& constraintSolverData) = 0;
169 
171  virtual void solvePositionConstraint(const ConstraintSolverData& constraintSolverData) = 0;
172 
173  public :
174 
175  // -------------------- Methods -------------------- //
176 
178  Joint(uint id, const JointInfo& jointInfo);
179 
181  virtual ~Joint() = default;
182 
184  Joint(const Joint& constraint) = delete;
185 
187  Joint& operator=(const Joint& constraint) = delete;
188 
190  RigidBody* getBody1() const;
191 
193  RigidBody* getBody2() const;
194 
196  bool isActive() const;
197 
199  JointType getType() const;
200 
202  bool isCollisionEnabled() const;
203 
205  uint getId() const;
206 
208  virtual std::string to_string() const=0;
209 
210  // -------------------- Friendship -------------------- //
211 
212  friend class DynamicsWorld;
213  friend class Island;
214  friend class ConstraintSolver;
215 };
216 
217 // Return the reference to the body 1
221 inline RigidBody* Joint::getBody1() const {
222  return mBody1;
223 }
224 
225 // Return the reference to the body 2
229 inline RigidBody* Joint::getBody2() const {
230  return mBody2;
231 }
232 
233 // Return true if the joint is active
237 inline bool Joint::isActive() const {
238  return (mBody1->isActive() && mBody2->isActive());
239 }
240 
241 // Return the type of the joint
245 inline JointType Joint::getType() const {
246  return mType;
247 }
248 
249 // Return true if the collision between the two bodies of the joint is enabled
254 inline bool Joint::isCollisionEnabled() const {
255  return mIsCollisionEnabled;
256 }
257 
258 // Return the id of the joint
262 inline uint Joint::getId() const {
263  return mId;
264 }
265 
266 // Return true if the joint has already been added into an island
267 inline bool Joint::isAlreadyInIsland() const {
268  return mIsAlreadyInIsland;
269 }
270 
271 }
